TopicTitle: carreer mode contracts are killing me

Articles.Content:
they are constantly one of these things
A. giving me contracts to do things ive already done numerous times (plant flag on mun specifically)
B. giving me contracts for rescuing *insert idiot here* from orbit of kerbin
C. go to planets that are far outside of my capabilities at my current SCI level

is their a mod or something i can do to make this a little more bearable? i dont think i can tolerate rescuing another doofus or planting another flag on the mun.

and also anybody know where i can get alot of science quickly? ive about exhausted everything on kerbin accept for the poles, im getting ready to do the mun, and dont tell me to go to minmus.......EVER. oh and i dont have the science module yet, forgot to get it and spent my points on space station stuff.......space station stuff that wasnt the science module...

oh and another question real quick so i dont make another topic, i had a contract to build a station around kerbin that required docking port, antennae, crew six kerbals, and 4000 fuel, the core of the station completed all of it but the fuel, and then i sent a fuel tank and docked it but it didnt complete, im guessing the game wanted me to send all of it at once?

2 hours ago, putnamto said:

they are constantly one of these things
A. giving me contracts to do things ive already done numerous times (plant flag on mun specifically)
B. giving me contracts for rescuing *insert idiot here* from orbit of kerbin
C. go to planets that are far outside of my capabilities at my current SCI level

 

A. It's free money.

B. It's free money and free crew.

C. Check the expiration date, normally you have many years to advance your skill tree (and skill) to fulfill the contract.

You want science but don't want to go to the planet you can return with multiple thousands of science points from. So I can't tell you where to go

Also, if all the contracts are for things youv'e done, or things you can't do, it's time to expand the number of things you can do.

5 hours ago, 5thHorseman said:

You want science but don't want to go to the planet you can return with multiple thousands of science points from. So I can't tell you where to go

Also, if all the contracts are for things youv'e done, or things you can't do, it's time to expand the number of things you can do.

haha, i just realized how dumb this topic is.......i was tired......

10 hours ago, Curveball Anders said:

C. Check the expiration date, normally you have many years to advance your skill tree (and skill) to fulfill the contract.

Not only that, but some of the mega contracts don't appear that often, so you just might have to accept one and sit on it till you can do it.
